Oka gramam adavulato cuttumuttabadi undi a gramam madhyalo oka podavaina puratana cettu nilici undedi A cettunu gramasthulu jnanacettu ani pilicevaru

A cettu tarataraluga vansalanu cusindi mariyu aneka rahasyalanu kaligi undani nammakam Oka roju mira ane cinna ammayi utsahanto mariyu sahasopetanga a cettu daggara velli dani jnananni adagalani nirnayinncindi
Mira cettu vaddaku velli jnanacettu naku santosakaramaina jivitaniki rahasyam ceppu ani adigindi
Cettu melliga pratispandinnci nenu oka rahasyam ceptanu kani nuvvu edurayye prati okkarito dinni panncukovalani naku vagdanam ceyali ani ceppindi
Mira taksaname angikarinnci cettu dani rahasyam velladinncindi santosakaramaina jivitaniki mulam tisukune danikante ekkuva ivvadam

Mira gandaragolanlo padindi kani cettu salahanu patinncalani nirnayinncukundi Ame tana porugu variki sahayam ceyadam modalupettindi tana aharanni panncukundi mariyu tanu ekkadiki vellina dayanu cupinncindi Enta ekkuva iccindo ame anta anandanga marindi
Tvaralo mottam gramam amelo vaccina marpunu gamaninncindi mariyu ame udaharananu anusarinncadam prarambhinncindi

Kalakramena gramam vikasinncindi Prajalu anyonyanga jivinncaru mariyu prati okkaru gatanlo kante santosanga unnaru Mira cettu rahasyanni eppudu maracipoledu mariyu tana prayananlo ekkadikellina dani jnananni panncukovadam konasaginncindi
Oka adavilo oka telivaina kakiki rucikaramaina rotte mukka dorikindi Utsahanto kaki tana rucikaramaina trit‌nu prasantanga asvadincadaniki dhrdamaina kommapaiki vellindi

Kakiki teliyadu oka mosapurita nakka duram nundi custondi ani A nakka kallalo akali merustondi Rotteto kakini cusina taruvata nakka dani svanta akalini tircukovadaniki oka mosapurita pranalikanu rupondincindi

Manoharamaina cirunavvuto kakini samipincina nakka kaki ni pogadam prarambhincindi Oh adbhutamaina kaki ni ikalu nenu epudu cudananta prakasavantanga unnayi mariyu ni svaram kuda tenela madhuranga undali Okka sari ni madhuramaina svaram to oka pata padava ani nakka kaki to ceppaga nakka yokka mannci matalaku santosinncina kaki pata padataniki noru teravadanto rotte mukka dani mukku nundi jari krinda nelapai padipoyindi
Merupu veganto nakka padipoyina rotte mukkani tisukoni adaviloki dusukellindi Nirasa cendina kaki nakka cetlalo kanipincakunda povadam custundaga adi kathinamaina satyanni grahinncindi
Oka nadi odduna unna cinna gramanlo gita ane palu amme mahila nivasincedi Ameku oka avu undedi avu palu ame jivanadharam
Prati udayam ame avu palu pitiki pala kyan‌nu talapai pettukuni bajaruku velledi Nadustu palu ammi vacce dabbuto em ceyalo uhincukuntu gita tana bhavisyat‌nu kalalalo uhincukunedi
Oka roju gita tana alocanalalo munigipoyindi I dabbuto oka kodini konali ani anukondi

A kodi gudlu pedutundi Vatini ammi dabbu sampadistanu A dabbuto mekanu konugolu cestanu ani kalagannadi Meka palu istundi a palanu ammi marinta dabbu sampadinci na jivitam bagu cesukuntanu ani tana uhalato anandincindi
Tana bhavisyattu gurinci alocistu ala kalagantu nadustunna gita ullasanto tala egiresindi Kani a ksananlone ame talapai unna pala kyan kinda padipoyindi Palu nela mida cindipoyayi
Gita kallamundu a palu matrame kadu tana kalalu kuda cediripotunnatlu anipincindi Ame tana nirlaksyam valla jarigina danini baga badhapadindi
ddi maidananlo oka cinna kani karunamayamaina cima nivasincedi

Oka roju tuphanu samipistunnatlu varta vyapincindi Kitakalu bhayanto asrayam kosam cuttu parugettayi Gandaragolam madhya a citti cima tana sanubhutigala hrdayanto kommalu mariyu akulanu sekarincadam prarambhincindi

Tana svanta bhadratapai enduku drsti pettadam ledani itara kitakalu a cima caryalanu prasnincayi Nenu sahayam ceyalanukuntunnanu Manam kalisi paniceste andariki asrayam nirmincagalamu ani samadhanam iccindi a citti cima
Tana parimananni cusi nirutsahapadakunda a citti cima kitakalanu oka jattuga erpatu cesindi

Jattukrsi mariyu drdha sankalpanto varsam kurisina samayaniki varu dhrdamaina asrayanni nirmincaru Kitakalu suraksitanga mariyu varsanlo tadavakunda kalisi gumigudadanto varu a citti cima yokka nisvartha carya yokka tivra prabhavanni grahincaru
Oka gaokappudu evariki varuga vunde kitakalu ippudu aikyamaiyi A citti cimu yokka daya gunam variki karuna yokka saktini mariyu manci kosam kalisi paniceyalane sadgunanni nerpindi
Daya gunam aikyatanu srstistundi Jivitanlo edurayye savallanu edurkovadaniki jattu krsi avasaram
Okanokappudu oka urilo seth ane vyakti cala krngipoyevadu A seth cala draivaru mariyu jittulamari vyakti Evariki sahayam ceyani pedalaku emi danam ceyani vyakti
Seth nivasincina gramam atanu mottam gramanlo atyanta dhanavantudu A seth daggara cala sampada mariyu bangaram mariyu vendi unnayi Kani ippatiki atanu bangaram mariyu vendi sekarana konasagincadu
Atanu cala atyasato unnadu atanu tana dabbunu ekkada kharcu ceyaledu Danivalla atanu manci aharam tinadu manci battalu vesukodu
Atanu tana jivitanlo garistanga bangaram mariyu vendini sekarincalani mariyu oka roju tana kosam bangaru pyales nirmincalani matrame laksyanga pettukunnadu
Appudu a bangaru rajabhavananlo tana jivitantam hayiga gadipevadu Ayite ila bangaranni sekaristune jivitamanta gadicipoyi vrddhudayyadu
Ippudu peddayyaka tana tappu telusukundi Tana yavvananlo atyasaku longipokunda dabbunu sakramanga viniyoginci undakapote iroju tana jivitam santosanga undedani anukovadam modalupedatadu
Tana dabbuto pedalaku sahayam cesi unte atanu santosanga undevadu Kani ippudu vitanninti gurinci alocince samayam gadicipoyindi mariyu atanu oka roju canipotadu
Atani marananantaram a grama prajalu a sethuni sampadananta tama tama illaku tisukellaru
Okappudu oka cinna gramanlo ravi ane pedavadu undevadu Atanu tana rucikaramaina samosalaku prasiddhi cendadu Atanu grama market‌lo vikrayincevadu
Ravi samosalu enta ruciga untayante ayana samosalu tinenduku duraprantala nunci vaccevaru Rucikaramaina samosalu tayaru ceyadanlo pratibha unnappatiki atanu sadharana jivitanni gadipadu
Atanu avasaralanu tircadaniki cala kastapaddadu mariyu atani kutumba posana gurinci taracuga andolana cendutadu Ippatiki atanu asa kolpokunda tana kastanni konasagincadu
Okaroju a uriki oka dhanika vyapari vacci ravi samosalu ruci cusi cala santosistadu Atanu ravito ceppadu mi samosalu adbhutanga unnayi
Nagaranlo naku cala restarentlu unnayi mariyu mi samosalu mimmalni vijayavantam ceyadaniki avasaramainavi unnayani nenu bhavistunnanu A samosalu na kosam ammagalava?
Alanti avakasam vaccinanduku ravi cala santosanga unnadu A vyapariki samosalu ammadam dvara atanu tana jivitanni mariyu tana kutumbanni marcavaccani atanu bhavistadu
Atanu ventane angikarinci atanu tayaru cesina samosalanu vyapari restarentlaku pampadam prarambhincadu

A vyaparavetta sahayanto ravi samosa nagaranlo cala phemas avutundi Ayana tayarucese samosalante janalu istapadatam modalupettaru Atani dimand peragadam modalavutundi mariyu ravi pagalu mariyu ratri samosalu tayaru ceyadanlo bijiga unnadu

Ardarlu ravadanto ravi sampadana peragadam modalavutundi Atanu munupatila pedavadu kadu baduluga atanu laksadhikari ayyadu Inka baga sampadincina sampada unnappatiki ravi eppudu pragalbhalu palakaledu
Atani vijayam taruvata ravi tirigi gramaniki vellalani nirnayincukunnadu Akkada siksana kendranni erpatu cesi gramalloni vantavallaku samosalu tayaru ceyadam nerpistanannaru
Ravi samosa asaku sphurtiki cihnanga marindi Pedarikam nundi vijayam varaku atani prayananni prajalu meccukunnaru mariyu vari kalalanu konasagincadaniki prerana pondaru
Okappudu adavilo cimaku cala daham vesindi Cima nitini vetukkuntu nadi odduku cerukundi Akkada ame niru tragadaniki nadiki samipanlo unna cinna bandanu ekkindi
Cima niru tragadaniki krindiki vangina ventane nadi niti pravaham veganga perigindi mariyu ame a rati nundi nadiloki padipoyindi Niru veganga pravahincadanto nadilo cima uvvettuna egasindi
Nadiki samipanlo oka pedda cettu kuda undi danipai oka pavuram kurcundi akasmattuga a pavuram cupu a cimapai padindi Pavuram ventane cimaku sahayam ceyalane sankalpam cesindi
Cimaku sahayam ceyadaniki pavuram cettu nundi oka akunu tisi nadiloki visirindi A cettu aku tana daggariki ravadam cusi cima veganga dani paiki ekkindi
Konta sepatiki a aku endina nelaku cerukogane cima akkadi nunci bayataku vaccindi I vidhanga nitilo nundi cima bayataku vacci pavuraniki krtajnatalu telipindi
Ade roju sayantram oka vetagadu pavuranni vetadenduku adaviki vaccadu Cimaku sahayam cesina ade pavuram adi teliyaka akkada prasantanga nidrapotondi
Akkada unna vetagadini cusina cima veganga atani padalapai ekki gattiga korikindi Dinto vetagadu gattiga aricadu adi vini pavuram melkoni egiripoyindi
I vidhanga cima kuda pavuram pranalanu kapadindi Intaku mundu cimala prananni kapadi oka goppa karyam cesinanduna pavuram pranam kapadabadindi
Okappudu oka uri daggara oka pedda dattamaina adavi undedi Okasari a pedda dattamaina adavilo enduko pedda mantalu celaregayi
A adaviloni jantuvulanni mantalanu cusi bhayapadi mammalni raksincandi ani aravadam modalupettayi Bhikara mantala karananga adavi mottam tokkisalata jarigindi
Jantuvulanni tama pranalanu kapadukovadaniki adavilo itu parugettadam prarambhistayi Ade adavilo oka cinna nirbhaya paksi kuda nivasincindi
Paksi migata jantuvulanni bhayapadatam cusi vatannintiki sahayam ceyalani alocincindi Nenu andariki sahayam ceyali ani paksi anukundi
Sahayam ceyalane alocanato cinna paksi oka nadiki velli dani cinna mukkulo nadi nitini nimpi adavi mantalanu arpe prayatnam prarambhincindi
I visayam cusi o gudlaguba i paksi enta murkhura ani manasulo anukundi Adaviloni i bhayankaramaina mariyu balamaina mantanu koddiga nitito ela arpavaccu?
Ila alocistu gudlaguba a paksi daggaraku velli nuvvu murkhudivi anavasaranga pani cestunnavu ani ceppindi Ni kompalo teccina koddipati nillato i manta ela arpiveyabadutundi
Gudlaguba mata vinna tarvata paksi cala maryadaga ataniki samadhanam iccindi nenu prayatnistune undali Parinamalu ela unna nenu prayatnam apanu
Gudlaguba paksi matalaku cala mugdhudai paksiki sahayam ceyadam prarambhincindi Idi cusi adaviloni itara paksulu kuda mantalanu arpadam prarambhincayi Mellaga adavi mantalu aripoyayi
Oka adavilo kappala pedda samuham nivasincedi Oka roju vari samuham mottam adavilo sancarincalani nirnayincukundi dani kosam a gumpuloni kappalanni adavi prayananiki siddhamayyayi
Mottam adavilo prayanistunnappudu a gumpuloni rendu kappalu madhyalo lotaina gotilo padipoyayi A lotaina goyyilonci bayata padenduku iddaru entagano prayatnincaru
Goyyi painundi ivanni cusina a kappala snehitulu iddarini egatali cestu peddaga arustunnaru
Ippudu a goyyilonci bayataku ravadam kastamani a kappalanni tamalo tamu ceppukuntunnayi Varu ippudu kuda prayatnincadam maneyali Vari prayatnalanni phalincavu
A goyyilo unna rendu kappalalo okati bayata nilabadi unna kappalannintini vini vati matalu vini nirasa cendindi

Nirasa cendadanto atanu goyyi nundi bayatapade prayatnanni kuda manesadu mariyu akkade tana jivitanni vidicipettadu Ayite marovaipu maro kappa matram pattu vadalakunda bayatapadenduku prayatnistune undi
Pade pade prayatnala taruvata kappa lang jamp cesi goyyi nundi bayataku vaccindi Idi cusi a gumpuloni kappalanni ascaryapoyi nuvvu ila ela cesavani adagadam modalupettayi
Aite a kappa nenu cevitivadini ani ceppindi Nenu goyyi nundi bayatapadataniki prayatnistunnappudu mirandaru nannu utsahaparicenduku biggaraga arustunnarani nenu bhavincanu

Memu Bengalurolu unnamu, ratri bhojanam chestAmu, somAvaram bayatakU vellAmu, KarnAtakalo unnAnu, paNduguLu jarupukuntu.
Nenu telugu sinimAlu chustAnu, eppudu puttArU, vayasSu unnArU, KrishnarAvupetalo unnAnu, puStakAlu chaduvutunnaNu.
Mire ekkada panI chestArU, HaidarAbAdulO panI chestunnaNu, somAvaram sinimA chustAmu, saNgItam paduttunnaNu, KarnAtakalo unnAnu.

isee samay jaapaan mein ek bhaarateey sant se jo bhaarat se aate the meree bhent ho gayee unhonne ek eeshvareey jyoti se mujhe sparsh kiya aur main sannyaasee ho gaya lekin main dekhata hoon ki unhonne mere hrday mein aur bhee anekon bhaav jinake lie bhaarat ke aadhunik sant bahut vyagr hain bhar diye–jaise bhaarat kee mahaanata ko jaagrat karana raashtr ka nirmaan aur karmath bana

Jeevan ka safar kabhi seedha aur kabhi tedha hota hai Har kadam pe naye mod aate hain aur kabhi kabhi humein apne raste ko dhundhna padta hai Yadi hum apni manzil ko paana chahte hain toh humein apni soch aur apni mehnat par vishwas rakhna zaroori hai Safalta unhi ko milti hai jo apne sapnon ke liye kathinaiyon ka samna karte hain aur kabhi bhi haar nahi maante

Jab tak hum khud par vishwas nahi karte tab tak hum apne sapno ko sach nahi bana sakte Jeevan mein mushkilein aati hain par unhe samajh kar hum apni taqat ka pata laga sakte hain Har naya din ek nayi umeed ke saath aata hai Har subah nayi umang ke saath apne din ki shuruat karna zaroori hai kyunki har din apne aap mein ek nayi kahani likhta hai

Dosti ka rishta sabse khaas hota hai Jab hum apne doston ke saath hote hain toh har dukh sukh mein unka saath milta hai Dosti mein na koi bhavnaon ki bandish hoti hai aur na hi koi shart Yeh bas ek aisa rishta hota hai jismein do dil apne dard apne khushi aur apni baatein ek dusre ke saath baant lete hain Aise rishte jeevan ko sach mein sundar banate hain

Agar hum apne sapnon ko sach karna chahte hain toh humein kabhi bhi rukna nahi chahiye Zindagi ke safar mein kai baar aisa lagta hai ki sab kuch khatam ho gaya hai lekin sach yeh hai ki jab tak hum apni manzil tak nahi pahunchte tab tak safar khatam nahi hota Har mushkil ka ek waqt hota hai aur jab tak hum uss mushkil ko samajhkar usse jeetne ka jazba rakhte hain hum apne sapno ko sach karne mein safal ho jate hain

Jeevan ki asli khoobsurti un chhoti chhoti baaton mein chhupi hoti hai jo hum aksar nazarandaz kar dete hain Har pal ko jeena aur har chhoti baat ko apne dil se mehsoos karna zaroori hai Kabhi kabhi sabse zyada zarurat humein khud ko samajhne ki hoti hai Jab hum apne andar ki awaaz sunte hain tab humein apni manzil ka pata chalne lagta hai

Zindagi kabhi bhi perfect nahi hoti lekin ismein khushi aur sukoon dhoondhna humare apne haath mein hota hai Har ek din humare liye ek nayi shuruaat hai Hum jahan bhi jate hain apne andar ek umeed aur khushi ka ahsas rakhte hain Jab tak hum apne jeene ki wajah dhoondhte hain tab tak humari zindagi mein kabhi bhi andhera nahi hota

Jeevan mein kabhi kabhi humen kuch aise faisle lene padte hain jo humare liye kathin hote hain Lekin yeh faisle hi humein zindagi ke asli maayene samajhne mein madad karte hain Jab hum apne faislon ka samna karte hain tab humein apne aap se sachcha hona padta hai Safalta tabhi milti hai jab hum apni galtiyon se seekhte hain aur aage badhte hain

Zindagi ka safar kabhi bhi asaan nahi hota lekin har kadam par naye anubhav aur seekhne ko milta hai Hum apne raste mein aane wali kathinaaiyon ko apne liye ek opportunity samajhkar unka samna karte hain Yeh samajhna zaroori hai ki humare sapne tabhi sach hote hain jab hum unhe apni koshishon se jeet kar haqdaar bante hain

Jeevan ki kathinaaiyon mein chhupi hoti hai ek nayi seekh Kabhi kabhi humare liye sabse mushkil samay bhi humari sabse badi taqat ban jata hai Humare andar ek shakti hoti hai jo humein kabhi bhi haar nahi maane deti Jab tak hum apne sapno par vishwas karte hain aur apni mehnat par bharosa rakhte hain tab tak hum kabhi bhi haar nahi sakte

Dosti ek aisa rishta hai jo apne aap mein behad khoobsurat hota hai Jab hum apne doston ke saath hote hain toh har dard har khushi aur har pal ko milkar jeete hain Dosti ka rishta sabhi rishteyon se alag hota hai kyunki yeh rishta bina kisi shart ke bana hota hai Apne doston ke saath jeevan ki har baat share karna jeevan ko khoobsurat bana deta hai

Jab hum apne sapnon ki taraf kadam badhate hain toh sabse pehle apne mann ki sunni padti hai Apne sapnon ko sach karne ke liye humein apne dar ko jeetna padta hai Jeevan mein kabhi kabhi aise pal aate hain jab humein apne aap par bharosa nahi hota lekin yeh pal sirf ek temporary phase hote hain Jab tak hum apne sapno ko sach karne ka jazba rakhte hain hum kabhi bhi apni manzil tak pahunch sakte hain

Zindagi mein khush rehna zaroori hai Agar hum apne jeene ki wajah dhoondhte hain toh har din apne aap mein ek nayi umeed hoti hai Khush rehne ke liye zaroori hai ki hum apne aas paas ki chhoti chhoti baaton ko samajhkar unhe apne jeene ki wajah banaayein Jab hum apni zindagi mein khushiyon ko dekhte hain tab hum apni manzil tak bahut jaldi pahuch jaate hain

Har insaan ki zindagi mein ek aisa pal aata hai jab wo apne sapno ko sach karna chahta hai Lekin sapne sach karne ke liye mehnat aur lagan zaroori hoti hai Jeevan ka safar kabhi bhi asaan nahi hota lekin jab hum apne sapno ke peeche lagte hain toh har kathinai apne aap asaan lagne lagti hai Apne sapno ko sach karne ke liye humein kabhi bhi rukna nahi chahiye

Zindagi ko samajhna humare apne haath mein hota hai Har din apne liye ek nayi umeed aur khushi ka ehsaas leke aata hai Jab tak hum apne sapnon ko sach karne ki koshish karte hain tab tak humari zindagi mein kabhi bhi andhera nahi hota Har pal ek nayi roshni ki kiran hoti hai jo humare sapno ko sach karne mein madad karti hai

Jeevan ki safalta unhi ko milti hai jo apni manzil ko paane ke liye kabhi bhi apne sapno se peeche nahi hat'te Har mushkil ko apne liye ek naye safar ka hissa samajhkar aage badhna zaroori hai Jab hum apni manzil tak pahuchne ke liye apne raaste mein aane wali har kathinai ko jeet kar aage badhte hain tab hum apne sapno ko sach kar paate hain

Jeevan mein har kadam par kuch seekhne ko milta hai Hum apni galtiyon se seekh kar apne aage ke safar ko behatar bana sakte hain Har din kuch naya seekhne ka ek avsar hota hai Jab hum apne dimaag aur dil ko khula rakhte hain tab hum zindagi ke har mod ko apne liye ek seekh bana lete hain

Zindagi mein apne sapnon ke peeche lagna zaroori hai Har sapna apne saath kuch kathinaiyan lekar aata hai lekin un kathinaiyon ko samajhkar unse ladna humari asli taqat hoti hai Jeevan ke safar mein kabhi kabhi humne socha nahi hota ki humein kaha jaana hai lekin jab hum apne sapno ko apna raste bana lete hain toh har mod apne aap kaafi asaan lagta hai

Zindagi ka har pal ek nayi umeed ke saath aata hai Hum apni zindagi ko apne hisaab se jeene ki koshish karte hain aur jab hum apne sapno ke liye mehnat karte hain toh safalta hamare kadmon ke neeche hoti hai Har din ek nayi shuruat hai aur har nayi shuruat ek nayi raah dikhati hai

Eka mora hota To phara vadhikhora hota Svatahcya rupaca tyala phara garva hota To nadikinari jayaca Svatahce pratibimba manata svatahcya saundaryaci stuti karu pahateMora mhana majha doladara pira paha tya pisarya mohaka ranga paha majhyakade paha sarvata sundara pakshi mica ahe
Ekedivashi morala nadikinavara eka karakoca disala Morane tyacyakade majhya tondata phiravale Ani tucchatene karakola mhanala kiti rangahina ahesa tu Tujhe pankha pandhare phataka ani nisteja aheta
Karakoca mitra tujha pisara basala ahe Majhya pankhanci udi sundara aheta Pana mhanuna kaya tumaca Pankhanni tujhya pankhanni akashata udi marali nahi Mora matra khajila tyacyakade pahata hote
Eka shetakari hota Tya shetakaryacya shetata kavalyanca eka motha thava roja yayaca Te kavale shetatila pikanca nasadi Khupa dhavapala vhavi Svatahne ekada tyanna dhada nirdesha dile

Eka divashi shetata jale takuna thevale Sadharana dhanya takale Kavalyanni dhanya pahile va te dhanya khanyasathi shetata utarale an jalata adakale Kavale adakalale shetakari khusha To mhanala are coranno ata tumhala sushikshita Evadhyata tyala eka kevilavana avaja aiku ala Tyala ascarya vatale

Shetakari kabutara mhanala tu kasa kaya ya tolita samilasa Pana ata mi tula sodanara nahi Tu vaita sangata dharalisa tyaca parinama tula bhogavaca lagela Ase mhanuna apalya shikari kutryala bolavale Dhavata maruna kutryanni ekamaguna eka paksanna thara kele
Eka vyaparyakade eka ghoda ani eka gadhava hote Ekedivashi to netana bajarala nighala Tyane gadhavacya pathivara khupa ojhe ladale hote Ghodya pathivara matra he sanketasthala
Ghodya he shabda ekuna gadhavace bolala nahi Taseca nimutapane doghehi calu lagale Gadhavelane ojhya mula gadhavace latapatu tyacya tondatuna phesa calu lagale

Vyaparyane jevha he pahile tevha tyane gadhavacya pathivara sarva ojhe utaravale Ani te sarva ojhedacya pathivara ladale Yanantara te calu lagaleCalata calata ghoda mhanala mighashi gadhavace nahi Jara tyace kharekhure ojhe ghetale asate tara mala he sarva mala shiksha bhoguna nyave lagate

Ekada eka kolha ani manjara shikari kutryabaddala bolata hoteKolha mhanala mala shikari kutryanca khupa ragaMalahi baithaka Manjara mhanaliKolha mhanala te khupa dhavata pana te mala pakadu shakata nahita Mala tyancyapasuna aneka goshati kalatata
Anekayukta Kolha phuraki marata mhanala kadhi mi ka jhudapa tutuna dhavato Jangalatalya datha jhupatala basato Tara kadhi ladakuna motha biluna basato Asha aneka tyancyakade aheta
Shikari kutryanni kolhyaca pathalaga suru kela Kolha ekamaguna eka yuktya vaparata hota Pana tyaca upayoga nahi Sherisa shikari kutryanni tya kolhyala pakadale ani thara marale
Parvata mhanala tu kiti chota prani ahe tu majha ajabata sreshtha nahisaUndira patakana mhanala mala mahita ahe ki mi tujha evadha motha nahi Pana tu matra majha evadha lahana ahe
Eka mothya shrimanta vyaktila arama milata hota Tyancyakade paisa paisa hota ani nukateca tyane eka khupa ghara ghetale hote Tyacyakade dhanasampatti tara hoti Sharirane to khupa dubala hota

To vyakti swarthi hota tyacyakade paisa kharcha karanyasathi vela milato tyala paise kamavanyachi savaya hoti Tyala doktara suvidha janyachi vela calata nahi Sharira badalane na lakshene tyace sharira kamajora vhayala lagale
Eka divasa kama thakuna to ala Aja tyace doke khupa dukhata hote to svatacya kholita javuna jhopuna gela Jevha tyacya navane tyala vicarale tevha bhuka nahi tyane jevayala sangitale nahi

Ardhya aneka tyace sarvanta anubhava vhayala have Tyala karane lakshata yeta aheta Achanaka tyacya vadhalele akarana eka akriti ubhi rahili Ti akriti mhanali mi tuzhi atma ahe ani aja mi tuzhya sharirata jata ahe

Atma mhanali majhi goshta eka tuzhe he ghara majhyasathi kahi kama nahi Majhe ghara tara tuzhe sharira ahe Je divasendivasa kamajora aneka roganni grasita aheTu kalpana tutaleli jhopadi rahanayachi Ani ata mi ya adhika kala vikara karu shakata nahi

Sevatcha nishkarsha evadhaca ahe ki pustake vachane ha sarvata changala chanda ahe Madhye shanka nahi ki pustakanchya kimati divasanche vyavahara ahe pana apana pustake layabraricha sandarbha dekhila vachu sakato Vachana darjedara ghataka lagata nahi Vachanā hi avada mi bhavishyatahi jopasata rahila ani tumhachi garajahi majha salla ahe ki tumhi vachanacha chanda jopasa

Kintu kalasira kache giye se hatasa halo sudhu thomṭa bariye cestā karala anekabara jala pana kara Kintu jalera nagala na peye kakati cinta karate lagala ki kara yaya! Kalasira asēpase kichu nuripathara parechila; segulo dekhate dekhate hathat kakera mathaya ekati buddhi ela

Ekati ekati kare nuripathara niye kalasira madhye phelate lagala se Pathara jayaga dakhala karayā jala uthe ela kalasira mukhera kache Trisnarta kakera prana khusite bhare uthala Thomṭa dubiye dubiye prana bhare jala pana kare se tara trisna metala
Tina dina dhare anabarata brishti ha'oyara karane ekati shiyala khabarera khomje kotha'o berote pareni Khidera jbalaya thakate na pere shiyalati banera madhye khabarera sandhane ghurate lagala

Ekate grame ekati rakhala chele basa karata Tara baba take bheradera yatna nite adesha diyechila Pratidina cheletike ghasera mathe bherade ra charate niye yete hato Rakhala cheletira ei kaja ekadama pachanda chila na karana se daurate ara khelate cha'ita Tai ekadina se gramera lokera sathe maja karara siddhanta nila

Hathat se citkara kare balala "nekare nekare!" Rakhala cheletira citkara shune puro gramera loka nekareke taranora jan'ya pathara sabala lati ye ya para la niye ela Kintu bane ese grambasira yakhana dekhala ye kona'o nekare nei rakhala balakati tadēra samaya nashta karechē ebam tadēra bhaya dekhābara jan'ya'i mithya katha balachē takhana tara birakta bodha karala ebam ye yara barite phire gela

Parera dina cheleti abara citkara kare balala "nekare nekare!" Ara grambasira abara'o nekare tarate rakhala cheletira kache daure ela Cheleti tadēra bhaya dekhe yakhana hese uthala grambasira chale gela ebam ke'u ke'u khuba ragabita hala rakhala cheletira kirtikalapa dekhe

Ajj tusi jado apne dosto naal baith ke purani yaadan te galla kar rahe si taan ikk ajeeb jheere jheere haseen lamhe yaad aaye jo bachpan vich sadi zindagi da hissa si jithe sab kuch simple te bina tension de si

Jad tusi sochde ho ke zindagi vich har cheez kuch asaan ho sakdi hai par jab tusi uss cheez nu apne haath wich lena chahunde ho taan tusi samajh painde ho ke har cheez apni mehnat samajh te samay mangdi hai

Zindagi vich jo mushkil velle aunde ne oh sirf tusi apne hosle naal paar kar sakde ho te jadon tusi apne dimaag nu ik jasbaat de naal ikatte karde ho taan har cheez mumkin lagdi hai jo tusi soch rahe ho

Kise vi lambe safar de dauran jadon tusi thak jaande ho te man kise hor cheez vich lag janda hai taan vaddiyan manzilaan tak pohnchne da asli maza tabhi milda hai jadon tusi apne mann nu har rukh de naal puri tarah samajh lende ho

Meri maa nu har roz naviyaan gallan dasna bohot zaroori lagda hai kyunki unhan da pyaar te duaai mere dil nu sukoon dindi hai te jeevan vich kisey vi vadday musibat de samne oh sab toh wadhiya sahara ban ke samne aundi hai

Jad tusi apni manzil nu jeetne da irada kar lende ho taan duniya di koi vi takleef tusi nu ruk nahi sakdi kyonki je tusi apne laksh nu pura karan layi apna pura hausla rakhde ho taan koi vi mushkil vi asaan ho jaandi hai
Tusi jado vichar karde ho ke kisse vi sheher ya mulk wich jaana hai taan apne man wich pehle hi ik tasavvur hona chahida hai jithe tusi sirf apni mehnat te dedication naal hi kamyabi paa sakde ho

Jadon tusi kisi naye kaam nu shuru karte ho taan pehle thoda dar te anxiety zaroor hoti hai par jab apne aap te bharosa rakheya jaanda hai taan saare mushkil raaste asaan ho jaande ne te har challenge nu jeet paida hai
Jab tusi apni zindagi vich navi soch te navi chuniyaan apnaunde ho taan tusi na sirf apne aap nu balki apne aas-paas de logan nu vi prerna dinde ho te zindagi nu ik navi disha wich mod dinde ho

Apni zindagi de har mod te jado tusi apni purani galtiyan yaad karde ho taan oh taareekhan ik navi samajh de naal nazar aundiyan ne jo tusi sirf apne experience ton hi samajh paande ho te oh sab kuch sudhar jaanda hai

Kuch lok samajhde ne ke chhotiyaan galan sirf time waste karn vaale ne par jado tusi apne apne naal sachmuch samay bita rahe ho taan har chhoti jehi baat ik khoj ban jaandi hai jide vich tusi apne asli manzil di raah paa sakde ho

Apne doston naal baith ke jado koi vadiya yaad aundi hai taan wo ek emotional connection ban jaandi hai jithe tusi apne purane palan te emotions nu naviyaan yaadan de naal jod ke apni zindagi nu vadhia banaunde ho

Zindagi de vich har insaan nu kabhi na kabhi bohot vaddi struggle face karni paindi hai par jado oh apne goals nu achieve kar lenda hai taan uss struggle di meethaai vich waddi satisfaction mehsoos hunda hai
Jado tusi apne goals nu set kar rahe ho taan ik dosri yaad aundi hai ke safalta sirf ussi din milti hai jab tusi apne aap nu itna mehsoos karwa lete ho ke tusi duniya da har challenge jeet sakde ho

Saddi zindagi vich kuch aise mod hote ne jithe koi vi dosti ya rishta apne apne goals nu samajh ke badal janda hai par jadon tusi har cheez nu apne man de hisaab naal samajh lainde ho taan sab kuch achha ho jaanda hai

Kise vi cheez nu apne jeevan da hisa banane layi tusi apne aap nu kabhi vichar karna chaheeda hai ke oh cheez thode naal kitni zaroori hai jadon tusi apne har decision nu soch samajh ke karte ho taan har cheez asaan ho jaandi hai

Zindagi wich kise vi samay jadon tusi apne dosto naal baith ke galla kar rahe ho taan ik navi soch de naal apne vich kabhi na kabhi kuch badalav laa sakde ho te apne doston naal milke bohot kuch seekh sakde ho

Zindagi di asli understanding uss time hundi hai jadon tusi apne aap nu samajh ke har din de har pehlu nu apne hisaab naal jodne di koshish karde ho te asi dekhde haan ke apne goals nu easily paa jaande ho

Jado tusi apni purani life de experiences de baare vich sochde ho taan kafi waran vich kuch baatein zindagi nu jaise ek hor perspective de naal samajh paida hai te oh tasavvur kuch vaddiyan understanding de naal transform ho janda hai
Apne man nu samajh ke apni zindagi nu jeene layi zaroori hai ke har cheez nu apni mehnat naal hi apne mann di directions de vich modde ho te phir duniya nu tusi apne goals naal inspire kar sakde ho

Jad tusi apne goal de pichhe puri mehnat laga ke jeet paate ho taan tusi samajh paande ho ke duniya wich har goal sirf apni determination naal hi achieve kita ja sakda hai te sab kuch ik vaddiyan journey ban jaandi hai
Zindagi wich kabhi vi koi vi mushkil samay langhna hunda hai par jado tusi apne dil vich yakin rakhde ho te apne goals naal chah vi tusi apni safalta nu sab kuch samajh ke paa sakde ho

Kise vi changi dosti da asli matlab samajhna hunda hai jado tusi apne dosto naal galla karde ho taan har ek feeling emotion te apne experiences de naal duniya de har mod de baare wich ik navi soch generate kar sakde ho

Zindagi de har mod te jadon tusi apni purani galtiyan yaad karde ho taan oh taareekhan ik navi samajh de naal nazar aundiyan ne jo tusi sirf apne experience ton hi samajh paande ho te oh sab kuch sudhar jaanda hai
Jadon tusi apni safalta de pichhe apne goals nu set karte ho taan samajh paande ho ke har cheez di mehnat sirf apne andar de motivation naal ki ja sakdi hai jo tusi apni naal vich rakheya hunda hai

Jad tusi apne dosto naal apni family naal te khud naal samay bita rahe ho taan ik navi soch di wajeh ton duniya vich har cheez de baare wich ik changi understanding paida kar sakde ho jo apni zindagi nu productive banaundi hai

Jadon tusi apne har goal nu puri mehnat naal paa lainde ho taan apne aap nu samajh ke apni zindagi vich navi chalakiyan te safalta de raste khul jaande ne jithe duniya vich kuch vi impossible nahi rehnda

Saddi zindagi vich kuch samay aise vi hote ne jithe apne doston naal baith ke purani yaadaniyan aur vichaar karna vi zindagi nu hor vaddiyan direction de sakda hai te tusi har cheez nu ik navi ummid te darja de sakde ho

Zindagi de har mod te jado tusi apne har decision nu soch samajh ke lene di koshish karde ho taan uss samay apne goals nu puri tarah samajh ke tusi apne raste de har mod te kuch valuable seekh sakde ho

Jad tusi apne purane goals de baare vich sochde ho taan oh sab kuch ek navi soch de naal apne mann vich samajh ke apne aap nu duniya vich ik vaddiyan direction de naal samajh paande ho te har cheez itni valuable lagdi hai

apane chh mah ke ahmar ke sath do dan ke liye man ke pas i thi man ka hath tham kar maskara dikoi bat nihen ami! aap pareshan na hon bas do mant ahmar ko sambhalin min abhi bartan dho diti honis ne ahmar ko man ke hawale kiya or kachan min ghas gayi ami band darwaze ko ghorte huvay nawase ko bahalane min lag gayin

ya koi aaj ka rona nihen tha bachapon se hi wah sardi ki bahat kachi thi sardiyan aate hi sardi sardi ki jo gardan sharo hoti to phar mosm ke badilne par hi khtam hoti scol or kalj se to chhatyan hoti hi then sath min man ka hath batane se bhi saf ankar bas razai min dabak kar ameron ke fawaid or ghareebon ke naqsanat par roshani dalti rahti
bahat samjaya magar wahin dhak ke tin pat wali bat yahi wajah thi kah sardiyan khtam hone par is ke sath sath ghar wale bhi aawaz baland kar ke shkar ada karte the

is sard sabah ka aaghaz ek bari khabar se hawa tha chhotay mamon ke chhotay sale ka antaqal ho gaya tha rashtah qaribi hone ki wajah se ami or abo donon ka jana zarori tha raat bhi ho sakti thi lican mahar ko akila nihen chhoda ja sakta tha tab hi ami ne ise bhi sath chalne ko kaha

is ne siyah badilon se ddhaka aasman or faza min halki dhand ko tirte dekha to khub shor machaya afoh! kiya zarort hay atni sardi min kahin jane ki? bad min ja kar taaziyat kar iye ga is ne apani taraf se shandar mashorah diya tha jas par ami ne ghor karna to dur sanana bhi gawara nihen kiya

koi fazul bakwas nihen jaldi se kapade badalo tamahare abo motr cycl le kar aate hi hon ge shehzad bhai hen naa! shehzad ahammad an hi ke gaon min rahte the or bhaion jise taalqaat the isi liye buqtee zarort kam aa jate the

kiya zarort thi is mosm min antaqal farmane ki! le ke mashakl min dal diya! kapade badilte huvay bhi is ki dhyan jari then jas par ami ne jhadk diya sarm to min ab lo! ansan apani marzi se marta hay jo ya alzaam bhi tam ne an par dal diya!
is se pehle kah wah mazid batin santi abo jo motr cycl le kar aaye the guli min nazar aaye mahar gulo khalaasi par shkar ada karti bahar aa gayi
motr cycl par bethte hi sard hawa ne jo istaqbal kiya to bawajud oper niche garm kapadon ke wah kapkapane lagi

isi liye min kahati hon kah sardiyan ameron ke ghar hi achi lagti hen ab bhala hater lagi garm gadiyon min bethane walon ko kiya pata kah bahar kisi ghazab ki sardi pad rahi hay! qarib se guzarti gadi ko dekh kar ise phar se khud par hawa zulm yaad aa gaya tha magar ami ne jawab dina gawara na kiya or ise shaid is se koi khaas farq bhi nihen padta tha

or khabrdar jo aap ne fotagi wale ghar min ja kar majhe hath batane ki naseeht ki ho kasi kam ko hath nihen lagaon gi min sath chal rahi hon isi ko ghanimat janiye! bajate danton ke sath warning de kar is ne shal kach or ziyadah chare ke gard lapet li

safar isi tarah jari tha kah is ki nazar khana badoshon ki jhagion ke samane khelte tin bachon par padi or wah jise jam kar rah gayi wah tinon anthi mukhudwash labas min the is ghazab ki sardi min bhi an ke jasmon par ek ek nicr phati parani shrt or khastah haal savater ke swa kach na tha na sar par topi thi na paon min jote

sardi ki shidat se an ke nile padte chare or kanpati tangin atni dur se bhi saf dikhai de rahi then magar wah is se nazarin charaye gili mati min khelne min mashghol the jo raat ki barsh ki din thi or jas se khalone bana bana kar wah apana waqat bata rahe the yaa dhiyan bata rahe the mahar samajh na saki

magar is gili mati ki thandic se ise apana aap jamata hawa muhasos hawa wah sakt thi or sardi ka shadeed ahsas jise yak dam khtam ho gaya tha ami is se kach kahah rahi then magar wah jawab kise diti? is ki to zaban hi gang ho chaki thi

ami heeran then or mazid heeran tab huve jab wah anhen warn karne ke bawajud or an ke kahe baghair hi fotagi wale ghar min hath batane lagi or ek bar bhi sardi ki shkayat na ki na wahan or na hi phar kabhi

cha kisa hi mosm hota wah bala chon charan kalj chali jati ami jo kam kahatin khamoshi se kar diti or sardi ka wavela karna to jise bhol hi gayi thi ami heert zadah then or is heert ka wah barmala azhar bhi kartin aapa bhi aksar ise chheda kartin kiya hawa bhi? kiya ab hamari mahar ko sardi nihen lagti?
wah kach kahane ke liye lab kholti magar gili mati ki thandic is ki rg w pay min esi sarayat kar chaki thi kah wah kach bhi kahane ke qaabl hi na rahti

jia ko is ki surt se bhi nafrt ho chaki thi magar is lmahe ise bachon ki tarah balkta rota dekh kar is ka dal passage gaya shaid miyan bevi ka rashtah hi esa hota hay is ne dal min socha or mazi ki har bat ko faramosh karke ise maf kar diya

ha ha is se ziyadah ghatya or kamazor antaqam ho hi nihen sakta tha ya afsana ngar aakhar atne be waquf kiyon hote hen fatmah ne afsana khtam karte hi tabsarah kiyakiyon bhi ab kon sa afsana bara lag gaya janab ko

nda jo pas hi bethi thi maskarate huvay boli ami to kahati hen kah ya afsane kahaniyan sab zandgi ki kahaniyan hoti hen or haqeeqat ke qarib hoti hen lican min nihen manti bhala ese kise ho sakta hay kah shohar atna zulm kare or aakhar min mafi mange or aap mahan devi ban kar ise maf bhi kar din fatmah gussay se boli

abhi tam ne zandgi dekhi hi ktani hay kiya pata shadi shdah zandgi min esa hi hota ho nda ne narmi se kaha tobah tobah baz i min esi shadi se fatmah ne kanon ko hath lagate huvay kahachap kar jao mat bola karo atna falto ad na kare esa waqat aaye
nda jo fatmah se sarf ek sal badi thi ise darate huvay bolifatmah dar ke mare ek bar phar kan pakad kar khamosh hogayi

hira ne lakhte lakhte qalam hath se rakh diya af wahi parani kahani! ab kiya aage ya lakhon kah fatmah ke sath bhi yahi hawa? nihen kach or sochana pade ga hara apane aap se batin kar rahi thi wah ek afsana ngar thi magar ab kach niya lakhana chah rahi thi

ek hi tarah ke afsane lakh lakh kar wah bur ho chaki thi is ne kahani adhori chhod di chand dan bad is ne dubarah kahani ko aage badhana chaha magar kamiyab na ho saki is duran is ki apani shadi te pa gayi phar shadi ki tyaryan shadi or shadi ke bad ki zandgi min wah esi masrof ho gayi kah lakhana lakhana sab ek taraf rah gaya

hara jo afsane lakhane min mahar thi apani zandgi ki dor ko bhi afsanon ki tarah saljhane lagi miyan ke dal min jagah banane ke sath sath sas ka dal jeetane ki koshash min lagi rahi aakhar kar is ne pasandidah bho ka darjah haasil kar liya

sas is ke mashore ke baghair koi kam na kartin nandin diyor sab is ke gan gane lage waqat guzarta gaya or hara ko pata hi na chala aaj jab is ne ine min khud ko ghor se dekha to ahsas hawa kah pandarah bars biyat chuke hen

achi bho achi bevi achi man or bhawaj banane ke chaker min wah khud kahin kho gayi thi wah larki jo kabhi khwab dekha karti thi ek aurt min badil chaki thi esi aurt jas min bazahar koi chamak baqi na thi ine min nazar aane wali ya aurt kon thi? ya hara to nihen ho sakti nihen ya min nihen ho sakti

hara apane khayalon min gum thi kah wasim is ka shohar ek ajeeb bat kahah kar is ke sar par bajali ban kar gara wah kahah raha tha kah ise koi or pasand aagayi hay or shaid wah dosari shadi kar le kiyon? aakhar min ne aap ke liye kon sa kam nihen kiya? har chies waqat par malti hay ghar saf sthara rahta hay aman or sakon bhi hay

aap ko majh se kabhi koi shkayat nihen rahi phar aap ne esa kiyon socha? hara sarapa swal ban chaki thi kiyon? wasim ne ek nazar is par dali kabhi ghar or kamon se hat kar apane aap ko bhi dekha hay zara ine min dekhana khud ko bhi karti ho majh se wasim ne gehra swal kiya

hara ine min khud ko dekh kar heeran thi ya be ddhanga sarapa jagah jagah jhankte safid bal be rang charah ya min hon is ne dubarah apane aap se pochha kiya karti then tamahari heroinin afsana ngar sahbah ine min khadi hara ne khud se swal kiya to kiya min bhi ek afsana ban rahi hon ya soch kar is ne jise khud ko nind se jagaya

daraz se barson parani diri nakali aakhari safhat par fatmah ki adhori kahani darj thiacha to ya kahani adhori is liye thi ab majhe fatmah ban kar ise makmal karna hoga wah soch kar maskari or apane liye kach batin not kin aaj ki taarekh darj ki or tin mahine bad apani shadi ki solahwensalgirah ki taarekh lakh di

niche ek jamlah lakha or maskarate huvay padha:han esa hi hoga agle hi dan hara ne khud ko badilne ka aaghaz kar diya apane chare or jald ka khayal rakha balon ko di karwaya or jadid tars ki ctong kari dit plan sharo kiya botik ke sarway kiye or ek ache dezainer se apane liye behtarin kapade tyar karwaye is duran wasim par bharpor tojah dina bhi sharo kar di na is se kasi larki ke bare min swal kiya na koi shkayat

bas wasim ki pasand ke khane banaye is se be takan batin kin or raat ko wak par sath jane lagiwaqat dhere dhere guzarta gaya shadi ki salgirah min ab pandarah dan rah gaye the aaj hara ne ine min khud ko dubarah ghor se dekha ya badali hoi hara thi

rozana halka phalka tyar rahna is ka mamol ban chka tha aaj bhi wah donon wak par gaye huvay the wasim kafi aljha hawa tha wah soch raha tha kah ab kiya kare jab wah dosari shadi ka soch raha tha to ab hara min koi khami nazar nihen aa rahi thi pehle to ajeeb be ddhangi lagti thi ab kiyon nihen lag rahi wasim is swal ka jawab talash karne min naakam tha

asil min hara ne atni aahastagi se apani zandgi min tabadili li thi kah kach bhi achank nihen hawa yahi bat wasim ke liye heerani ka baas thi do tin dan bad hamari shadi ki salgirah hay min soch rahi hon kah is bar sab ko balalon aap bhi jase chahen anvit kar lin hara ne kahajase dal cha

wasim ne jase par zor dite huvay pochha is par hara maskara kar boli ji jas ko bhi wasim ne doston ke sath sath jahanum ko bhi bala liya acha hay wah samajh le gi kah min dosari shadi ka kiyon soch raha hon wasim ne dal min socha

kali sadhi pahune motya ke pholon ka ziyor sajaye or naye andaz se set kiye huvay balon ke sath hara ne ine min ek nazar khud ko dekha is ne apane aap se kaha kah tamahin aaj jeetana hay har haal minwah wasim ke sath chalti hoi tibl tak i hal min sab ki nazarin an par then wasim bhi ise is rop min dekh kar heeran tha

kahan to wah har waqat ek be rang be tartib hara or kahan ya hara jas par se nazarin hatna mashakl thaaaj bhi behtarin jodi hay aap ki kasi ne taarif ki to wah maskara di or kik cottine ke bad mahumanon ki tawaza min masrof ho gayi

ek taraf wasim ke ek dost ne dabe dabe lahaje min kaha kah tam to kahate the kah tamahari bevi be ddhangi hay isi liye dosari shadi ka soch rahe ho esi aurt be ddhangi hoti hay? agar yahi mayar hay to majhe to maf hi rakho wasim kach kahane ke liye muda lican wah shaqs wahan se ja chka tha hara ne dur khade ek aurt ko wasim se bat karte dekha acha to ya hay wah

hara ne dal hi dal min socha magar wah apane kam min lagi rahidaut ke akhtatam par hara apane kamare min i wasim bhi patchhe patchhe aa gaya wah kach kahana chah raha tha lican alfaz dhond nihen pa raha tha wasim ne aakharkar kaha kah sori hara hara ne maskara kar jawab diya kah muhabbat min etimad hota hay sori nihenwasim khamosh ho gaya hara ne apani diri athai is safhe ko khola jahan tin mahine pehle is ne ek jamlah lakha tha is ne jamlah padha:fatmah ne ise dal se maf kar diya hara fatehana andaz se maskari diri band ki or zandgi ke naye safar ki janb qadam badha diye

yaq bastah hawaon ne ese bari tarah thathara dala tha atna kah dant bajane lage jasm par kapkapi taari hogayi bik pori raftar se taarkol ki stric par dod rahi bhi hasin jamd chap labon pah sajaye huvay tha ktani dur rah gaya hay ghar ? namrah ne larzati aawaz min pochha tha bas das mant min pohchte hen

jawaba is ne bhi kanpati aawaz min bataya das mant to bahat ziyadah hen min akad jaon gi sardi se namrah ne manmena kar kaha phar esa karte hen adhar hi aas pas kasi ghar min ghas jate hen  sabah jab dhop nikal aaye gi to ghar chale jain ge

sanjeedah aawaz min kaha gaya tha wah is ki ject ko ghor ke rah gayi sath hi dal se aah nikali thi naaul naault min kise hero apani ject atar kar heroin ko de dite hen apani parwa kiye baghair or ek ya shaqs hay jase min thatharti nazar hi nihen aarahi  ktana ankar karti hen heroinin phar bhi hero zabardasti apani ject de dite hen is ka shidat se dal chaha tha kah hasan ise apani ject atar kar de de magar wahan ese koi aasar nazar nihen aa rahe the

sano is ne aawaz min mazid kapkapahat taari ki thi sanao sanjeedgi se kaha gaya tha bahat ziyadah sardi lag rahi hay meri qalfi ban jaye gi majhe pata hay sardi bahat ziyadah hay min bik chala raha hon hawa ke thapede direct mere mana par pad rahe hen  tam to mere patchhe chhap gayi ho tamahin kam az kam majh se to kam hi lag rahi hay or meke se saral tak ke is thode se safar ki adi ho jao namrah ko rona aaya tha ya sab san kar

is ne ek bar phar is ki ject ko ghora tha ktana be has tha ya shaqs ek wah naayab jilani ki stori ka hero tha farid kise is ne apani parwa kiye baghair isma ko apani ject diye di thi bahat dan pehle padhi gayi stori ise yaad i thi or qalfi jamati hay banti nihen hay hasan ne is ke dosare jamle ka jawab diya tha

do mant ki ka khamoshi ke bad wah kals ke rah gayi is ne hasan ke kandhe par hath rakhane ke bahane ject ko mathi min masl diya dhiyan se yaar garao gi kiya sardi ki wajah se pehle hi bik chalana mashakl ho raha hay  wah be zaar lahaje min bola tha namrah ne apane aansuon ka gula badi mashakl ghonta tha

agar tam bik chala rahi hotin naan tab tamahin pata chalta sardi kiya hay wah is ki khamoshi se koi natijah akhaz kar ke bola tha ya kiya tam majhe bar bar taana diye rahe ho is bat ka wah is dafa bari tarah chadi thi do kas bat ka ? wah heeran hawa thayahi kah tam bik chala rahe ho or min tamahare patchhe bethi hon

kiya min bik chalati or tam mere patchhe bethe ache lago ge? hasan ne jhatake se ghar ke samane bik roki or niche atr kar ghora wah pharti se niche atr ke khadi thi taana nihen be waquf  ahsas dala raha hon  kas bat ka ahsas? ab ke wah heeran hoi thi yahi kah tamahin meri balkal fikar nihen hay ek alina bha bhi hen atna ahsas karti hen amer bhai ka  har mamle min amer bhai ke ghar aane se pehle garma garm chaye tyar hater aan  kambl diti hen

paon dabati hen wah ek ek kam ganwar ha tha namrah ise dekh ke rah gayi agle dan bhi wah hasan ki be hasi ke matalq hi sochti rahi thi ( ject nihen di thi naan ) phar ek khayal is ke zhan min aa hi gaya hasan ki be hasi khtam karne ke liye is ne wah sare rasale nakale jan min wah kahaniyan then jan min hero heroin ko apani ject atar ke dite hen is ne wah kahaniyan nakalin or sabah fold kar diye sham min hasan afs se aaya to is ne maskara kar istaqbal kiya phar chakn min chali gayi

hasan chinj kar ke ti vi aan kar ke beth gaya namrah garma garm khana nakalte waqat ya hi soch rahi thi pata nihen hasan rasale padhe ga bhi yaa nihen khair khana khane ke bad abhi hasan bastar min betha hi tha kah namrah jhat se rasale nakal li ab tam ya padho gi yaar tim hota hay har kam karne ka wah jhanjalaya tha namrah maskari thi

are nihen hasan min ya nihen padh rahi min to chaye banane jarahi hon tam padho ya qasm se bahat achi kahaniyan hoti hen an min majhe sas bho or nand bhawajon ki laraiyan padhane ka koi shauq nihen hay is ne be zaari se kaha or mobile atha liya namrah mayusi se ise dekhti rah gayi magar agle hi lmahe is ne mayusi ko mar bhagaya ad ho ek to tam har waqat mobile min hi masrof rahte ho

buzurg thek hi kahate hen  mobile ne nayi nasl ko barbad karke rakh diya hay matalay se duri ki wajah se hi aaj ki nayi nasl atni be taki hay farsat ke lmahat ki behtarin dost katab hoti hay namrah ne bade madbarana lahaje min kahate huvay is ke hath se fon liya tha hasan ise ghor raha tha meri barbadi ke kon se qase san liye hen tam ne or kon sabe taka pan dekha hay tam ne mera  auth mah hamari shadi ko huvay hen or tam sab kach jan gayin mere matalq

meri bat ka ya mutalab thodi tha aah wah dal hi dal min karah athi ek wah larkiyan hoti hen janhen baghair kach kahe shohar ki ject mal jati hay or ek min … or min kon sa is ki ject pahunane ke liye tars rahi hon ek chah hay ktana acha lagta hay shohar ka yon khayal karna tam to barahi man gaye hasan ! min ne to wese hi bas sana sanaya tabsarah kiya

wah maskara kar bolia chhaya raa chaye banalao majhe bahat sardi lag rahi hay tam to sara dan ghar min rahti ho tamahin kiya pata bahar ki sardi kiya hoti hay bik par thathar ke rah gayawah apane hi dikhade ro raha tha nambrah kals ke rah gayi magar ek aakhari koshash samajh ke wah kahah athi -kiyon nihen hasan! majhe ahsas hay

acha min abhi chaye bana kar laati hon  tam ya kahani padho bur bhi nihen ho geis ne ek rasalah khol ke ise pakadaya or baqi tin mez par rakh diye hasan ne badil naakhwastah rasalah pakada or yon hi nazar dodane laga namrah is ka mobile qabzay min liye kachan min aa gayi

ajeeb si khushi horahi thi ise jo kahani wah ise de kar i thi padhane ke liye is ke dosare safhe par hi hero heroin ko apani ject atar ke dita hay hasan ko padhte hi khayal aajaye ga kah min ne kal ktani ziyadati ki namrah ke sath ise apani ject na de kar  wah maskarati soch rahi thi is ne jan bojh kar chaye banane min der lagai namrah chaye bana rahi ho yaa paye gula rahi ho

hasan unchi aawaz min is se pochh raha tha is ne dant kachakchaye thedo mant sakon se padha nihen ja raha is se  wah badbadati hoi kachan se bahar nikali to ise sardi ka ahsas hawa tha wah sot ke sath ka barik dopata liye huvay thi shal bed par padi thi kamare min wah tre liye kamare min dakhal hoi to dhak se rah gayi

hasan is ki shal lapetay rasale apane samane phelaye madus ko ghor se dekhane min magan tha wah karah ke rah gayi or tizi se madus ke chare ghaib karne ke liye aage badhi or is ke samane se rasale atha liye

muslim sciencedan aur falsafi, aljahiz ne apni kitab kitabul haiwan main lafze dahriyat ko khasi umumiyat dete huye use aise shakhs ke liye ikhtiyar kiya he ke jo rab ka munkir ho, tamam takhliq, jaza aur saza ka inkari ho aur apni khwahishat ka pairukar ho yahan ye bat qabile ghaur he ke apni pehle mafhum main ye istilah bunyadi taur par aik aise shakhs ka liye ya aqeede ke liye aati he ke jo waqt ki lafani haisiyat ko maanta ho aur us ki kisi khaliq ke zariye takhliq ka inkari ho, phir ye mafhoom phel kar tamam aqsam ke khuda ke inkar aqaid tak istemal hone laga aur baaz auqat isi mafhoom ko chand aise maano main istemal kiya jata he ke jis main mazhab se hatao paya jata ho.

kendra sarakara astama betana ayogaku anumodana karichhanti kendra mantri aswini baisnabanka anujayi duishabishare astama betana ayoga gathana heba jetebele saptama betana ayogara karjyakala sesa heba nua betana ayoga sahita kendriya karmacharinka betana abng pen‌san‌re ullekhaniya brudhi ghatiba boli asa karajauchhi ehaa fitment factar dwaraa nirnaya heba

phi kamishana fitment factara upare adhara kari karmacharinka daramaa brudhi pain suparisa kare sarakari karmacharinka betana abng penasan ganana pain fitment factar heuchhi eka gunnaka mudraspheeti karmacharinka abashyakata abng sarakaranka arthika kshamata bhalli karakaku bichara kari ehaa sthira hoichhi
eka mudraspheeti hara- mudraspheeti kipari brudhi paichhi abng karmacharinka jibanasaili upare ehara prabhaba jepariki ghara kimba kara kinnibare asubidhaa bhalli pe kamishana dekhanti

due kharcha upare dhyana- nua betanaku suparisa karibabele pe kamishana chaulla gahama dali panipariba khira chini tel indhana bidyut jalla bil manoranjana parba abng bibaha pari kharchaku bicharaku neithae
tini arthanaitika paristhiti- desara arthika sthitiku madhya bichara karajae jadi arthaniti bhala bhabe badhuchhi adhika betana brudhi pain adhika sujoga rahithae
cha karmacharinka karjyadakshata- betana ayoga karmacharinka samagrika karjyadakshataku bichara kare jadi karjyadakshata bhala ehaa betana suparisaku sakaratmaka bhabare prabhabita karithae
pana maarcat tulana- besarakari kampaanigudika dwaraa pradana karajaithiba betana brudhiku madhya sarakari karmacharinka pain pratijogitamulaka betana nischita karibaku pe kamishana parikhya karanti

krutrima budhimatta ba ai (artificial intelijens ) upare chalithiba bitarkare nija mata rakhichhanti rilians indastrij caraman mukesa ambaani
gujaraatara pandita dinadayaal sakti biswabidyalaya (pidiiyu) ra samaabartana samaarohare jogadei chhatrachhatrinku sambodhana kari artificial intelijens upare se kahichhanti
tume chat jipiti byabahara kara kintu manerakha je ame krutrima budhimatta sahita nuhen barang nija budhi sahita agaku badhiba abng ehadwaraa tume agaku badhipariba

chhatrachhatrimananka saha bartaallapare se kahithile mun amara juba chhatrachhatrimananku gotie paramarsa debaku chahunchhi janne krutrima intelijensku eka sadhana ba upakarana bhabare byabahara karibare paradarsi heba abashyaka kintu tumara nijara budhi byabahara karibaku bhulantu nahin

ehi biswabidyalaya chhadiba pare tumaku eka bada ‘jibana biswabidyalaya’re jogadana karibaku padiba jeunthare nathiba kaunnasi campas nathiba srenigruha abng padhaibaku nathibe sikshaka tumemane kebala nija dambhare jibanare agaku badhipariba

pradhanamantri narendra modeenka prasansaa kari mukesa ambaani kahichhanti pandita dinadayaal sakti biswabidyalayara janma pradhanamantrinka asadharana duradrustira fala kodie barsha purbe se mote kahithile je gujurata sakti abng sakti utpada khetrare desara netrutwa neba se chahuchhanti

ethisahita biswa starara manaba sambalara bikasare gujurata madhya eka agranni bhumika grahana kariba uchita ehibhalli bhabare ehi agranni biswabidyalayara sthapana hoithila suchanaajogya je mukesa ambaani pidiiyura sansthapaka sabhapati o adhyaksha rahichhanti

ehi samaabartana samaarohare joga dei mukesa ambaani kahichhanti je “mun spast bhabare dekhiparuchhi je ehi satadira sesa purbaru bharata biswara sabutharu samrudha rastra heba duniara kaunnasi sakti bharatara bikasa jatraku roki pariba nahin

mahakumbha saraa biswaku gotie barta deuchhi  tahaa heuchhi na kaunnasi jati na kaunnasi sampradaya na kaunnasi vedabhaba samasta loka gotie sangamare jodi hoichhanti kaahaa pakhare kie snaana karuchhi tahaa kaahaku bi jannaanahin ekata hin akhandata mahakumbhara barta boli kahichhanti uttara pradesa mukhyamantri jogi adityanatha

jogi adityanatha kahichhanti mahakumbha ekata o bhaicharaara barta deuchhi ehaa akhandata o sanaatara dharmara pratika sanaatana majabuta hele desa majabuta heba bharata surakhita rahile samasta sampradaya surakhita rahibe

jogi adityanatha kahichhanti purba sarakarare eupire jangalaraja thila ebe uttara pradesare ramarajya chaluchhi samastanku bikasamulaka jojana saha joda heuchhi kodiyesatarare punni thare nda sarakara asiba boli kahichhanti jogi adityanatha
Namaskar, apana kemiti achhanti?
Mo naama Rakesh.
Apananku cha bhalapae?
Mu pustak padhibaku bhalapaye.
Aaji mora din bahuta bhala.
Mu school jibu.
Apana kahinki Bhubaneswaru asuthile?
Apananka din kemiti gala?
Mate sahajya darkara.
Kali ame dekhima.
Tume kemiti acha?
Mu bhalare achhi.
Eithare asa.
Tume kana khaucha?
Mu dudu piuthili.
Tume kothare achha?
Aji mora ghare bibaha.
Amara ghara kuthai?
Sabuthire khusi achhanti.
Tumara nama kana?
Eha dekha.
Seha dekha.
Tume kana chintauchha?
Mu kana chintibi?
Tume bahuta sundara achha.
Tume kuthai jaucha?
Mu khauchhi.
Seha theeki.
Seha jeevana.
Amara sabuthire premai achhi.

Mu dekhibi.
Tumetharu sundara.

Eithare basiba.
Seha chali gala.
Seha jeevana.
Mu suni.

Kana khabara?

Tuma mana kana chintauchhi?
Mora bhai kahile je, ame jebe school jaiba, tahele samasta chhatra-matrika alga alga kari padhai kariba, jaha ki ame sabu thare acchi bhale padhiba.
Aji raatri mora gharare bohot asadharana bara gharar sammilani hela, jaha re sabu sangathita loka thile, ebong samasta manisha bhala anubhaba karuthile.
Sehi din re, ame sabu dasa lok re jaha thili, samasta manisa mila gala, kemiti samasta gote gote padachheda re, ananda re bhala samaya bitaile.
Jebe se school chhadi jaanti, se nijara gharare bapu-mama sahita basiba, jaha re samasta chhatrika anubhaba bhala kari padhai kari rahiba.
Mora bandhu mo katha sunibara bisare thare jaichi, se bahut samaya agaru jaha jaichi, ta pare kichhi samaya ku bandhu eka asar pare.
Bada samaya pare, ame bahut upakara kari, prathama dina ame padhai kari thili, au aji ta sabu thik bhala karuchi.
Mora bahut bhari anubhaba hela, jebe ame sabu thare saman milithile, au samasta mana parama bhala asile, taha ame jebe kalija re padhai karuthile.
Mora parivara re aneka lok thaanti, sehi samayare, samasta lok manisa eka bhari chahida thile, gote purana anubhaba madhya rahe jaha manaku bhala anubhaba karuthile.
Jebe ame trip re giye, sabu thare baithaka karuthile, sehi samaya re, sabu prakarika bhala bisaya samasta anubhuti karuthile, samasta milijula jeevana re.
Bada jatha chhadi, ame sabu bhala kariba, ta pare ame padhai kari janiba, sehi din re samasta jagare ekata.
Mora jana, ame sabu din sehi bisaya re anukula padhi parile, jebe ame padhi samasta anubhaba pain bhala.
Mora gharare mama rahichanti, ehi samaya re samasta sabu mana milithile, sehi samaya re, sabu lok eka padhai re ruchi bharithile.
Jebe ame jauthile, samasta lok samasta padachheda re badhithile, jaha ki ame sabu manisha eka parama anubhaba karuthile.
Mora bandhu jebe kahile, ame jete samaya padhai kari thile, sehi samaya re ame sabu bhala karuthile.
Jete samaya padhai karile, ame bahut upakara pai, ebong sehi din re sabu chhatra ananda anubhaba karuthile.
Mora chhatrika jaha bhala, sehi samaya re ame sabu loka milithile, padachheda re bhala padhai re ruchi karuthile.
Mora bandhu sehi samaya re, school jauthile, samasta padachheda re padhai karuthile, au sabu samasta bhala jiba.
Sehi samaya re, sabu loka eka sathire samasta ruchi anubhaba kari thile, ta pare ame aneka katha kahile.
Mora parivara re, jebe ame padhai re samasta sathire prashna puchuthile, ta pare ame sabu thare padhai kari thile.
Sehi dina, ame samasta bhala kari, sabu thare padhai re ruchi karuthile, ta pare samasta anubhaba bhala samayare.
Jebe ame samasta manisha milithile, padhai re ruchi karuthile, ta pare ame sabu sathire jana pare.
Sehi samaya re, ame sabu loka eka madhyama padachheda re padhai kari thile, jaha ki samasta manisa ekata bhala anubhaba kari.
Bada bhari bhala padachheda kari thile, ta pare samasta sabu loka eka sathire bhala padhiba kari thile.
Mora bandhu sehi samaya re padhai karuthile, jaha re samasta manisha milithile, ta pare ame sabu eka anubhaba kari thile.
Sehi din re ame sabu lok samasta padachheda re padhai karuthile, ta pare ame eka bhari ruchi anubhaba karuthile.
Mora chhatrika sehi samaya re, padhai karuthile, au sabu anubhaba bhala thile, ame sabu samasta eka sathire padhai karuthile.
Bada samaya pare, ame school padhai re ruchi karuthile, ta pare ame sabu thare padhai kari thile.
Jebe ame school padhai re anukula karuthile, samasta lok samasta prashna milithile, ta pare ame sabu bhala karuthile.
Mora bhai sehi samaya re padhai karuthile, ta pare ame sabu loka eka madhyama anubhaba kari.
Sehi samaya re, ame sabu sabdare ruchi karuthile, samasta sabu lok eka bhala anubhaba kari thile.

Sindh mein kayi qadeem tamaddun abad thay jin mein Mohenjo Daro bhi shamil hai aur yeh tamaddun duniya ki tareekh mein ahm maqam rakhte hain Sindh ki saqafat aur sajan poori duniya mein mashhoor hai aur yahan ke log apni riwayaton ko tamam ghano ahmiyat dete hain

Log Sindh mein mohabbat aur mel-jol se rehte hain aur apni riwayaton aur rasmon-o-rawaj ko tamam ghano ahmiyat dete hain Yahan ke culture mein geet naach aur kahaniyan ahm kirdar ada karte hain aur har koi unmein ghano dilchaspi leta hai

Darya-e-Sindh ka paani zara'at ke liye buniyaadi haisiyat rakhta hai aur is ke karan Sindh ki zameen hasildaar hai Darya ke kinare par abadi shuda shahron aur gaon mein zindagi ghani khushhaal hai aur log paani ki ahmiyat ko samajhte hain

Kitaab insaan ke zehen ko wasee karte hai aur usay nayi jaanch aur tajurbaat dete hain Kitaab parhne se insaan ke soch mein tabdeeli aati hai aur usay duniya ki mukhtalif saqafat aur riwayaton se waaqif karte hai
Taleem insaan ki taraqqi ka buniyaad hai aur isay muashray mein behtar maqam dene mein madad milti hai Taleem ke zariye insaan apni salahiyat ko ujagar karta hai aur apni zindagi ko sanwarta hai

Fann insaan ke jazbaat aur khayalat ko zahir karne ka ek zariya hai aur is se insaan apni andaroni duniya ko bahar dikhata hai Fann ki mukhtalif shakhein jaise musawari moseqi aur adab insaan ki zindagi mein rang bharte hain

Sehat insaan ki zindagi ka ahm hissa hai aur isay barqarar rakhne ke liye mutawazan ghiza aur warzish ki zaroorat hai Sahih rehne se insaan apne kaam mein behtar karkardagi dikhata hai aur khushhaal zindagi guzarta hai

Mausam Sindh mein garmi aur sardi ki shiddat se badalti hai aur har mausam ka apna asar zameen aur logon par hota hai Garmiyon mein log garmi se nibhrte hain jabke sardiyon mein thandi ke saath khushgawar mausam ka lutf uthate hain
Gaon Sindh ki saqafat ka markaz hain aur yahan ke log saadi aur mohabbat se zindagi guzarte hain Gaon mein zara'at buniyaadi pesho hai aur log apni zameen par kaam karte hue apna ghar chalate hain

Shahr Sindh ki taraqqi aur muashi sar-garmi ka markaz hain aur yahan ke log mukhtalif pesho se munsalik hain Shahron mein taleem sehat aur rozgar ke behtar moqa'ay muhayya kiye gaye hain aur log yahan taraqqi kar rahe hain

Safar insaan ki zindagi mein nayi yaadgirein aur tajurbaat deta hai aur is se insaan ki duniya dekhne ka nazaraha wasee hota hai Safar dauran insaan nai saqafat aur logon se milta hai aur iski zindagi mein tabdeeli aati hai

Mela Sindh ki saqafat ka aik ahm hissa hain aur yahan ke log geet naach aur kahaniyon ke sath khushi ka izhaar karte hain Melaon mein mukhtalif riwayati khaane aur mashroobat pesh kiye jate hain aur log yahan mil kar khushi manate hain

Kahani insaan ke zehen mein nayi soch aur khayalat paida karti hai aur is se insaan ki zindagi mein nayi sikhiyaan aur tajurbaat shaamil hotay hain Kahaniyan insaan ko duniya ke mukhtalif waqi'at aur kirdaaron se waaqif karati hain aur iski soch ko wasee karti hain

Moseqi insaan ke dil aur rooh ko sukoon deti hai aur is se insaan apne jazbaat ko zahir karta hai Moseqi ki mukhtalif qisam jaise lok moseqi aur jadeed moseqi insaan ki zindagi mein rang bharte hain aur log isay ghano pasand karte hain

Zameen insaan ki zindagi ka buniyaad hai aur is par zara'at karke insaan apna ghar chalata hai Zameen ki ahmiyat ko samajh kar log isay mehfooz rakhne ke liye koshish karte hain aur paani ke sahih istemal par zor dete hain
Paani zindagi ka buniyaadi ansar hai aur is ke bina zindagi mumkin nahi Paani ke sahih istemal se insaan apni zameen ko sarsabz aur shadab rakhta hai aur apni zindagi ko khushhaal banata hai

Bagh insaan ki zindagi mein khushboo aur rang bharne ka sabab banta hai aur ismein mukhtalif qisam ke phool aur darakht insaan ko sukoon dete hain Bagh mein waqt guzarne se insaan ke zehen mein sukoon aur khushi paida hoti hai aur isay fitrat mein tazaagi milti hai

Janglat zameen ki khoobsurti aur hayatiati tanau' ka markaz hain aur ismein mukhtalif janwar aur darakht zindagi guzar rahe hote hain Janglon ko mehfooz rakhne se insaan apne mahol ko saaf aur khushhaal banaata hai aur apni aane wali nasal ke liye behtar duniya chhordta hai

Aasman insaan ki soch ko wasee karta hai aur ismein mojood taaray aur kehkashaan insaan ko hairat mein daal dete hain Aasman par nazar daalne se insaan ke dil mein sukoon aur khushi paida hoti hai aur isay fitrat ki khoobsurti ka ehsaas hota hai

Sitarah aasman ki khoobsurti aur raaz ko zahir karta hai aur is par nazar daalne se insaan ke dil mein khayal aur khwab janm lete hain Sitarah insaan ko duniya ki wusat aur azmat ka ehsaas dilata hai aur isay apni zindagi mein nayi manzilon ka dikhata hai

Chand raat ki khoobsurti aur sukoon ka nishan hai aur is par nazar daalne se insaan ke dil mein mohabbat aur sukoon paida hota hai Chand ki roshni mein insaan apne khayalon mein gum ho jata hai aur isay zindagi ki khoobsurti ka ehsaas hota hai

Saj zameen par roshni aur tawanai ka buniyaadi zariya hai aur iski roshni se zameen par zindagi mumkin hoti hai Saj ki garmi se insaan apna kaam karta hai aur iski roshni mein zindagi ki khoobsurti ka ehsaas hota hai

Badal aasman par ghoomte hain aur insaan ke dil mein khushi aur umeed paida karte hain aur iski barsaat se zameen tazaagi aur khushhaali dikhaati hai Badal insaan ko fitrat ki khoobsurti aur qudrat ki azmat ka ehsaas dilate hain aur isay zindagi mein nayi umeedein dikhate hain

Barsaat zameen par tazaagi aur khushhaali ka sabab banti hai aur iski wajah se zameen par pokh aur zara'at mumkin hoti hai Barsaat ki farrfarr se insaan ke dil mein khushi aur sukoon paida hota hai aur isay fitrat ki khoobsurti ka ehsaas hota hai
Hawa zindagi ka buniyaadi ansar hai aur is ke bina zindagi mumkin nahi Hawa ki safai se insaan apni sehat ko behtar banata hai aur apni zindagi mein khushhaali dikhaata hai

Pakhi fitrat ki khoobsurti aur hayatiati tanau' ka hissa hain aur iski geet se insaan ke dil mein khushi aur sukoon paida hota hai Pakhiyon ko mehfooz rakhne se insaan apne mahol ko saaf aur khushhaal banaata hai aur apni aane wali nasal ke liye behtar duniya chhordta hai

Janwar zameen ki hayatiati tanau' ka hissa hain aur iski madad se insaan apni zindagi mein ghano faida hasil karta hai Janwaron ko mehfooz rakhne se insaan apne mahol ko saaf aur khushhaal banaata hai aur apni aane wali nasal ke liye behtar duniya chhordta hai

Darakht zameen ki khoobsurti aur hayatiati tanau' ka hissa hain aur iski madad se insaan apne mahol ko saaf aur khushhaal banaata hai Darakhton ko mehfooz rakhne se insaan apni aane wali nasal ke liye behtar duniya chhordta hai aur apni zindagi mein khushhaali dikhaata hai

Pakistani qaum mehnat aur jafaakish se apne mulk ki taraqqi ke liye kaam kar rahi hai aur iske karan mulk mein taleem sehat aur rozgar ke behtar moqa'ay muhayya kiye gaye hain Pakistani qaum ki mehnat aur jafaakish se mulk taraqqi kar raha hai aur iske karan duniya mein mulk ka naam roshan ho raha hai

Duniya mein mukhtalif qisam ke log aur saqafatein hain aur har aik ka apna riwaj aur reet hai Duniya ki khoobsurti aur tanau' ko samajh kar insaan ke zehen mein wusat aur sajan paida hoti hai aur isay zindagi mein nayi sikhiyaan aur tajurbaat hasil hote hain

Mohabbat insaan ji zindagi mein khushi aur sukoon jo sabab banji thi ain un san insaan apni zindagi ke sanwaran mein kamyab thi tho Mohabbat je zariye insaan apni dil ji gharbal manhun san ghuji khushi saan zindagi guzari tho ain un khe zindagi ji khoobsurti jo ehsaas thi tho

Dosti insaan ji zindagi mein ahm kirdar ada kare thi ain un san insaan apni khushi ain gham ke share kare tho Dosti je zariye insaan apni zindagi mein nayi yaadgiron ain tajurbaat hasil kare tho ain un khe zindagi ji khoobsurti jo ehsaas thi tho

Khandan insaan ji zindagi jo buniyaad aahe ain un san insaan apni khushi ain gham ke share kare tho Khandan je zariye insaan apni zindagi mein mohabbat ain sukoon hasil kare tho ain un khe zindagi ji khoobsurti jo ehsaas thi tho

Taleem insaan ji taraqqi jo buniyaad aahe ain un san insaan apni zindagi ke sanwaran mein kamyab thi tho Taleem je zariye insaan apni salahiyatan ke ujagar kare tho ain apni muashray mein behtar maqam hasil kare tho

Kam insaan ji zindagi mein ahmiyat rakhe tho ain un san insaan apni zindagi ke sanwaran mein kamyab thi tho Kam je zariye insaan apni khandan jo ghar chalai tho ain apni muashray mein behtar maqam hasil kare tho

Safar insaan ji zindagi mein nayi yaadgiron ain tajurbaat de tho ain un san insaan ji duniya ke dekhne jo nazro wasee thi tho Safar je zariye insaan naayi saqafatain ain manhun san mili tho ain un ji zindagi mein tabdeeli aayi thi

Mela Sindh ji saqafat jo aik ahm hissa aahe ain hite ji manhoo geet naach ain kahaniyon san ghuji khushi jo izhaar kare tho Mela mein mukhtalif riwayati khaana ain mashroobat pesh kiye wenda aahe ain manhoo hite ghuji khushi manain tho

Sangeet insaan ji dil ain rooh ke sukoon de tho ain un san insaan apni jazbaat ke zahir kare tho Sangeet je mukhtalif qisam jeko lok sangeet ain jadeed sangeet insaan ji zindagi mein rang bharain thi ain manhoo un khe ghano pasand kare tho
